plot: Lookalike brother's Govardhan&Harshvardhan exchange their names in childhood and decide to live each others life forever without the knowledge of their parents but what will happen when their strict father will come to know about this.
title: Dil Hi To Hai
plot_es: Lookalike brother's Govardhan&Harshvardhan exchange their names in childhood and decide to live each others life forever without the knowledge of their parents but what will happen when their strict father will come to know about this.
plot_en: Lookalike brother's Govardhan&Harshvardhan exchange their names in childhood and decide to live each others life forever without the knowledge of their parents but what will happen when their strict father will come to know about this.
